subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The senior Javi Salas pitched a perfect game as Miami routed Villanova, 17-0. Salas, drafted in the 38th round by Minnesota last year, faced only four three-ball counts.
snippet: The senior Javi Salas pitched a perfect game as Miami routed Villanova, 17-0. Salas, drafted in the 38th round by Minnesota last year, faced only four three-ball counts.
